description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Fullfill your uncertain destiny in this unique-awesome-arcade-roguelike-ninja-dungeon crawler! Advance through rooms filled with dangerous enemies and traps! Defeat fearsome bosses! Pick up tons of different equipment and improve your abilities! Developed by Milkstone Studios
